title: Question about chromas
body:
Hello :)

When new chromas be available for purchase with ip, would all previous ones who were also with ip available too? I mean for those who missed it?

replies.body: The blue essence shop is aimed to appear some point during the preseason.  Check out our [preseason faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) in the meantime, and hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qX5pL8Ty,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-17T18:37:11.863+0000)
>
> The blue essence shop is aimed to appear some point during the preseason.  Check out our [preseason faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) in the meantime, and hang tight!

No that's not what I asked, I know about that...
My question was if those chromas that we've seen in store before with ip, would be back in the future (i know they would be in BE).

Ah, sorry for the confusion.  Per our [chroma FAQ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qX5pL8Ty-question-about-chromas?comment=00000000), chromas on sale would reappear every other IP sale.  We've had 2 so far that I can recall, so you might not see chromas from the last sale.  With the conversion of IP and change in the air, I highly recommend ramping up for the [blue essence shop](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) during preseason for now.
